participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and curious, enjoys exploring new ideas and concepts.
participant_1.background: I love kids and dogs, but I could never be a teacher if I were blind. Zebras are my favorite animals. There I am a general of an oris army. I can't get enough ginger snaps. I love butterflies.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, prefers quiet activities and values personal connections.
participant_2.background: My worst experience was when I was in a car accident and my family and I were all injured. I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing. I hate the taste of fish. I am really short. I am a happy person.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing?
I'm doing alright, what about you?
I'm doing well, thank you! What are you up to today?
I'm working on a painting of a zebra. What are you doing?
I'm just chilling, relaxing. I don't like big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing.
I don't like big crowds either, but I love to go to Comic Con. I love all the costumes and the people watching.
I can see how that would be fun. I'm just not a fan of being around so many people.
That's understandable. What are some of your hobbies?
I like to stay active, so I go for walks and hikes a lot. I also like to read and watch movies.
Hiking sounds like fun, I've never been on a hike before. I love to read too, what are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but my favorite genre is historical fiction. I also like to read biographies and memoirs.
I've never been a big fan of historical fiction, but I like to read biographies and memoirs too.
We should exchange book recommendations sometime!
